name: Jumpy Karate Kid - Pole Vault Over the Obstacles
name_original: Jumpy Karate Kid - Pole Vault Over the Obstacles
description: Welcome to the best ninja karate jumper game in the world! Now, you can easily jump over any problem, or across them! Nice graphics, interesting game play, and forever FREE, this app is just for you, for your entertainment. Jump all the time also, you can run! The best finger training app! Play the best karate jumper game in the world! Jack The Jumpy Karate Kid - Pole Vault Over the Obstacles will challenge you to beat your best score and BEAT YOUR FRIENDS BEST SCORE! Forever free, this app is just for you, for your entertainment. Jump from rock to rock, avoid those evil birds or pop them, but watch out of those nasty bombs! Jack The Jumpy Karate Kid - Pole Vault Over the Obstacles features challenging physics based game-play and hours of fun and adventures! You will need logic and true karate skills to achieve the best scores and challenge your friends!
